title: naTana pUjai seivOm
sahitya:
naTana pUjai seivOm vArIrE navarasa kalai nayangaL kulunga naTana rAjan sannidhi idil


anupallavi

  talatalavena tALam muzhanga tangai Azhum puzhudum ponga


caraNam    vEdam Odi isai arangai vidhi murai vaDivaNagi Om Om Om 
adi bharata nipuNa pagetta Agama paDi dEham niNangi
		(madhyamakAla)
aga agamena takamuyir iNai tANDuvam puri naDu
takadhimi tadhingiNatOm enru tAvi tAvi tAvi magizha
